trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Orem
There were no other sightings in Orem on or around November 8th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsiT was very close when my friend spotted it. We noticed the object just as a single engine plane flew by at a low alt.I retreived binoculars from my truck while my freind and his mom wathched it. It slowly rose into the air I could see that on side had a yellow glow or aura and the other side was a blue aura it was rotating clockwise Disc shaped but pointed triangular corners it rotated in the glowing Basically looked like a small forcefeild or something until it disappeared into clouds 10,000ft ceiling it was unnerving to see something like that in broad daylight im glad i had witnesses, I hope someone else saw it as well I didnt fell threatened
